channel.title: Help with bonus menu! please!
channel.description: Okay so when I bring up my equipment menu to see my item bonuses, the bonuses show but when i equipt a new piece of armour with different bonuses, i have to close the screen and then open it again to see the new bonuses. Also, when its up, if i wield a new weapon, it automatically closes. how do i fix this? thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2009, 09:01:21 pm[/size][hr]anyone know ? :(

item.title: Help with bonus menu! please!
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Tank Ags Tank
item.description:
@Ags_Tank wrote:

Okay so when I bring up my equipment menu to see my item bonuses, the bonuses show but when i equipt a new piece of armour with different bonuses, i have to close the screen and then open it again to see the new bonuses. Also, when its up, if i wield a new weapon, it automatically closes. how do i fix this? thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2009, 09:01:21 pm[/size][hr]anyone know ?
